TopicTitle: Pro Props - Wearable items for your kerbals. Updated to KIS!

Articles.Content: Added Viking shield, and settled the Viking pack!

Wow, everything updated. And a new shield, nice.

Sorry I couldn't help, I had not enough time and only tested a few props. I knew you would do it better, anyway.

Don't worry.

More items next weekend. (May be)
in the list.

How about adding a blaster rifle or something? I've seen models on that rifle site.

Anyway a Stormtrooper carrying an assault rifle or something like a crowbar looks weird. lol

Edited April 21, 2015 by Acea
sure. good point.
Can you maybe add the helmets and spacesuits from Interstellar movie please? THANK YOU

There are many space suit/helmets I want to make (interstellar is one of them), but little time. so, for now I prefer be creative and do the ones I have planed first.

Is more easy if you give me the model done.

Also is really motivating if some of you do videos of tell histories with the props.

No need to mention how grateful I am with any collaboration that you can give, like Nli2work did. Actually the idea is to be community based.

Edited April 22, 2015 by Locob

Hello! I am a big fan of KSP and I like Your work very much. Please could you make Snoopy Caps to wear under the Helmets plz? And probably also a Gemini-Like early Apollo Helmet (A1C Helmet)? This would be great!

Thanks a lot for Your work!

That would be a cool thing to do.

--

I did a thing planed long time ago. Pretty happy with the result. Doesn't move, sorry. If a modder want the models to make it move, send me a PM.

I found that most helms are not equippable by female kerbals. Probably they use equip mesh that doesn't exist in female models.

The only equippable was the full glass space helmet.

Edited May 7, 2015 by Enceos
Can someone add darth vader's mask & suit with light saber? I would appreciate so much!

In the config, the helmets are atached to the teeth. I think the kerbgals have modified teeth. I will check it this weekend or the next one.

I still specting help or collaboration with this "Mod"

good news everyone!! I got the model.

still. Expect it to the next week

Ok, this looks extremely cool but I have a problem.

I am running KSP 1.0, and whenever I put the parts into the parts folder for KIS, everything starts up normally.

When I go into the VAB or SPH, the flag is screwed up and no parts appear... help? Am I installing it wrong?

Thanks,

John

yeah the pro props folder shoudl go into the Gamedata folder

it should go Gamedata>Propropsorwhatever>Parts

Yea, any parts folder should work. If you still unsure, put it with KIS parts.

The gravity force is all around you

Is in the list.

I can make only the helmet, and only the mask and one with no mask, if you want.

About the Helmets on the female Kerbals: I found the problem. I sent a message to KospY to see if i can avoid to change the code in every not working part.

The thing is that KerbGals use "equipMeshName = headMesh" and males use "headMesh01"

If you are in a hurry change the line to this "equipMeshName = eyeballLeft" that way both will be able to use the helmet.

Edited May 17, 2015 by Locob

I made it. left to port it to the game.

edit: it's up!

Edited May 18, 2015 by Locob
hello, would it be possible to add Bane's mask? (you know, from Batman) to the mod

You can retexture some mask that already in the list. I recommend the "mustache prop".

I'm going to make some gas mask but is not like the Bane.

May other person could do it and drop it here.

Gotta say, this mod makes KSP much more fun and gives each Kerbal a character.

People. Theoretically you can make your own hats, without a modeling program. Instal the welder mod, and the rescale mod, then make a thing, rescale all, weld all, then fix the config file for the new part and add the KIS module in it. And that's, it. Theoretically.

You should end with your own custom hat using only KSP and the Notepad.

Hello Locob! Can you plz post where I can find the welder mod and the rescale mod? I will try to make the Snoopy Cap & the A1C. Actually I don't have a glue how to make it work, even if my model is finished.... but first I will try to make something look like the real things.

Thanks a lot for your work!
